## Port.write() method

Write data to the port, making room if the port is full.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
write(value: string | number) : string | number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | string \| number | The data to be written |

<b>Returns:</b>

string \| number

The element that was displaced if the port was full, otherwise null
